mapper.select: SELECT empinfo.empinfo_name, notice.* FROM empinfo INNER JOIN notice ON empinfo.empinfo_no = notice.empinfo_no_writer WHERE notice.notice_type = 'NOTICE' AND notice.notice_deletedat IS NULL ORDER BY notice.notice_no ASC

SELECT notice.notice_no, empinfo.empinfo_no, empinfo.empinfo_name, empinfo.empinfo_email, notice.notice_title, notice.notice_content, notice.notice_createdat FROM notice INNER JOIN empinfo ON notice.empinfo_no_writer = empinfo.empinfo_no where notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.insert:
select seq_noticeno.nextval from dual
insert into notice( notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_type, empinfo_no_writer, notice_createdat, project_no ) values( #{notice_no}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, 'NOTICE', #{empinfo_no_writer}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), 0 )
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content = #{notice_content}, notice_modifiedat = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') where notice_no = #{notice_no}
update notice set notice_deletedat = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') where notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_createdat FROM ( SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_createdat FROM notice where notice_type = 'NOTICE' ORDER BY notice_no DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_createdat FROM ( SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_createdat FROM notice where notice_type = 'INQUIRY' ORDER BY notice_no DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
